name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with a robust background in building efficient and scalable solutions. Proficient in **Go**, **Linux**, **Postgres**, and familiar with **Java**, **C#**, and **C++** programming languages, I excel in developing high-quality software solutions that meet stringent performance and reliability standards. With 8 years of experience, I have a proven track record in automation, data processing, and asynchronous programming. My experience encompasses full lifecycle software development, encompassing microservices, event-driven architecture, and distributed systems.
Additionally, I bring expertise in building applications that comply with various protocols and RFCs, coupled with hands-on experience in VM management and malware analysis. With a commitment to leveraging technology for optimal performance, I am well-prepared to contribute to innovative projects and lead initiatives aligned with organizational goals.
